label: specifiedPlot
comment: A crop plot specified for this agricultural application.

rangeIncludes.comment: A small piece of land or water used for a crop such as an agricultural or aquacultural crop.

domainIncludes.comment: A named, delimited and identified part of a land and or water surface of the globe subject to dedicated uniform agricultural treatment.
Any substance such as seed, fertilizer, water, gas or chemical applied to an agricultural field, substrate, construction, plant, animal or product.
